summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the image‑processing utilities and end‑to‑end pipelines of the MaskFormer segmentation model, covering mask conversion, segmentation map handling, processor configuration, and post‑processing for instance, panoptic, and semantic outputs.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the MaskFormer image‑processing components so that downstream computer‑vision applications can rely on accurate segmentation results in production environments.
